attributes.action: protect are health care workers and frontline staff
attributes.additional_details: Many people are facing a risk of loosing there jobs for not getting the covid-19 vaccination, people who have worked threw-out this pandemic are now in fear that they might not have a job now that we are coming to the end of the pandemic, i am now asking the government to review making covid-19 vaccinations mandatory across the health care profession and to protect are healthcare workers from loosing there jobs if they dont get the vaccination.
attributes.background: Protect are healthcare workers and frontline staff that are loosing there jobs for not getting the covid-19 vaccine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842

The Government is currently consulting on mandatory vaccination for frontline health and care staff. You can find out more and submit your views here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/consultation-on-mandatory-vaccination-for-frontline-health-and-care-staff
